attributes.additional_details: Revoke article 50 and reverse brexit to rejoin the eu!!
attributes.background: Brexit legislation is clearly not working for the uk and is now known to be a uk scam!

rejection.details:
The UK has left the EU so it is not possible to reverse Article 50, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Apply to rejoin the EU: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631497
